thread.title: Selena Gomez opens up about being called fat
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez opens up about being called fat

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Selena Gomez opens up about being called fat
text:
Comments 
Los Angeles, Oct 10: Selena Gomez faced flak for being overweight earlier this year when she shared a picture of her wearing a bikini during vacation and the singer was shocked as it was the first time she was called “fat”.The 23-year-old former Disney star, who was on “The Ellen DeGeneres Show”, said the reaction she got online was weird, but she was not bothered about it, reported E! online. (Also Read: Selena Gomez underwent chemotherapy for lupus) 
“It was the first time I’d ever been called fat. But it was weird because it’s not just oh she’s fat. It’s like she’s a mess.”She’s gone off the deep end. I’m like because I’m on a vacation wearing a bathing suit? Actually technically that is a little too small for me, but I didn’t care,” Gomez said.The “Good for You” hitmaker did not want slamming to take over her and shared another picture showing she was more than happy in her skin. 
“I don’t what them to win. It’s so annoying when I see it all over the place and everybody thinks they can bring me down. So, my immediate response was I’m gonna post a picture and I’m like ‘I’m happy with me ya’ll’ and that was going to be the story the next day. I wasn’t going to let that be the story,” she said. 
  10, 2015 9:58 AM Topics:
